name: TitTok 3
description:
TitTok 3: FINAL CHAPTER - the final part of the legendary TitTok saga. The darkest chapter of the trilogy..


The player's goal is to complete all levels and not die from the attacks of evil enemies and traps! You can find bombs on levels and plant them ANYWHERE, even in the air!

▪ Cute Kitties ＼(≧▽≦)／
▪ Atmospheric and melodic soundtrack by Sun Candles
▪ Three difficulty levels, from super-Easy to Hardcore!
• Mind-blowing gameplay unfolding in 40 unique locations.
▪ Cool puzzles! Three difficulty modes of 10 levels.
▪ Unlimited number of Bombs and Massive explosions
▪ Double jumps to the skies! Ultimate attacks!
▪ Deadly Lasers, Destructive Cannons and Fast Knives!
▪ Crazy moving platforms and dizzying slow-mo portals!
▪ Incredibly beautiful effects, cool lighting and fine particles!
▪ A variety of enemies, Mini-Bosses and a cool Super Boss.
▪ Bigger, Longer, Uncut and detailed levels.
▪ Super cool plot, an epic conclusion to the enchanting trilogy!
▪ 99 achievements and much more, incredible and exciting!
▪ And in the game you can and even need to MEOW a lot ^.^

TikTok? No! TitTok! TikTok ≠ TitTok
TitTok 3: FINAL CHAPTER - An epic conclusion to the enchanting trilogy!
And remember: "Tit before your Tok!"
